byline.original: By ALBERT R. HUNT | BLOOMBERG VIEW

lead_paragraph: Three Republican candidates have been holding forums in New Hampshire, a state that has often determined the party's ultimate nominee for president.

headline.main: Shaking Up G.O.P. Politics in New Hampshire
headline.print_headline: Shaking Up G.O.P. Politics in New Hampshire

snippet: Three Republican candidates have been holding forums in New Hampshire, a state that has often determined the party's ultimate nominee for president.
